Common.siteDescription: 200+ free online tools. All processing happens directly in your browser.

messages.dragDrop: Drag and drop files here or click to select
messages.noServerUpload: Files are not uploaded to any server. All processing happens directly in your browser.

pdf.name: PDF Tools
pdf.description: Convert, merge, split and more PDF tools

imageEdit.name: Image Edit
imageEdit.description: Resize, crop, apply filters and more

videoAudio.name: Video/Audio
videoAudio.description: Video and audio file conversion and editing

text.name: Text Tools
text.description: Text conversion, formatting and analysis tools

social.name: Social Media
social.description: Download and optimize social media content

developer.name: Developer Tools
developer.description: Code formatters, encoders, hash generators and more

pdf-to-jpg.title: PDF to JPG
pdf-to-jpg.description: Convert PDF files to high-quality JPG images instantly.

jpg-to-pdf.title: JPG to PDF
jpg-to-pdf.description: Combine multiple JPG images into a single PDF file.

merge-pdf.title: Merge PDF
merge-pdf.description: Combine multiple PDF files into one.
merge-pdf.instructions: Select the PDF files you want to merge. You can drag to reorder them.

split-pdf.title: Split PDF
split-pdf.description: Split a PDF file into multiple files.

compress-pdf.title: Compress PDF
compress-pdf.description: Reduce PDF file size for easier sharing.

png-to-jpg.title: PNG to JPG
png-to-jpg.description: Convert PNG images to JPG format.

jpg-to-png.title: JPG to PNG
jpg-to-png.description: Convert JPG images to PNG format.

webp-to-jpg.title: WebP to JPG
webp-to-jpg.description: Convert WebP images to JPG format.

resize-image.title: Resize Image
resize-image.description: Adjust the width and height of your images to any size.

crop-image.title: Crop Image
crop-image.description: Cut out the desired area from your images.

compress-image.title: Compress Image
compress-image.description: Reduce image file size for web optimization.
compress-image.instructions: Select image files to compress. You can adjust quality and max dimensions.

json-formatter.title: JSON Formatter
json-formatter.description: Format and validate JSON data beautifully.

base64-encode.title: Base64 Encoder
base64-encode.description: Encode text or files to Base64.

hash-generator.title: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate various hashes like MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256.

unit-converter.title: Unit Converter
unit-converter.description: Convert various units like length, weight, temperature.
